property.value: When this card enters your field, you may rest target resonator.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may pay {L}{1} less to play this card, if it targets a Saint. Target J/resonator you control cannot be targeted by spells or abilities until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: As an additional cost to play this card, rest two recovered light resonators you control. Remove target resonator from the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: {L}{Rest}: Target resonator gains [+200/+200] until end of turn.

property.value: When a resonator deals damage to this card, this card deals that much damage to that resonator.

property.name: Text
property.value: [Target Attack] (This card can attack recovered J/resonators.) When this card enters your field, you may destroy target rested resonator. Whenever this card attacks, you gain 200 life.

property.value: This card gains [+800/+800] as long as you control five or more resonators. When this card is put into a graveyard from your field, you gain life equal to its DEF.
